name: Cornell Chicken
steps: Cut the Whole Chickens in into Half Chickens (or Quarters)
Use teh first batch of Cornell Marinade to marinate the Half Chickens overnight (~18 hours)
Drain the marinade from the Chicken
Grill Chicken about 1 foot over charcoal (make sure coals are hot)
If you're feelin' it, maybe put some wood on the coals for smoke
Continue the following until cooked (might take up to 3 hours)
Baste generously every 5 minutes (using the safe, 2nd batch of Cornell Marinade)
Flip every 15 minutes or so, ensuring an even heat distribution
Be sure to thoroughly heat the breast and thighs in particular
Once cooked to FDA standards, serve
comments: This is delicious, but easy to undercook so be careful
